contents.name: Affinity Designer
contents.description: Vector graphics editor with a bunch of features which also supports Adobe file formats

contents.name: Affinity Photo
contents.description: Photo and raster graphics editor which works together with Adobe file formats and Affinity Designer

contents.name: Aseprite
contents.description: animated sprite editor & pixel art tool.

contents.name: Gimp
contents.description: GNU Image Manipulation Program. It is a freely distributed piece of software for such tasks as photo retouching, image composition and image authoring.

contents.name: Inkscape
contents.description: An open-source vector graphics editor similar to Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, Freehand, or Xara X.

contents.name: Krita
contents.description: Krita is a professional FREE and open source painting program. It is made by artists that want to see affordable art tools for everyone.

contents.name: LibreSprite
contents.description: LibreSprite is an open source fork of Aseprite.

contents.name: Lightcube
contents.description: Pixel Art Editor for Windows, supposed PSD files in addition to JPEG, PNG, BMP, GIF.

contents.name: Multipaint
contents.description: A cross-platform (Win, Linux, Mac) image editor/painter which covers the color limitations of 8-bit machines (like C64, ZX Spectrum etc.)

contents.name: Paint.NET
contents.description: Paint.NET is free image and photo editing software for PCs that run Windows.

contents.name: Pickle
contents.description: Another Pixel art Editor.

contents.name: PiskelApp
contents.description: Free Online Pixel Art and Animated Sprite Tool.

contents.name: Pixelmator
contents.description: Full-featured image editing app for the Mac

contents.name: Pixelator
contents.description: Turn any image into fancy pixel-art

contents.name: Pixen
contents.description: Pixel Art Editor for OSX

contents.name: project one
contents.description: A picture converter and editor for the Commodore 64 covering different graphics mode of this computer. Windows only

contents.name: PyxelEdit
contents.description: Pixel art editor designed to make it fun and easy to make tilesets, levels and animations.

contents.name: REXPaint
contents.description: a powerful and user-friendly ASCII art editor.

contents.name: rx
contents.description: a modern & minimalist pixel editor

contents.name: Tilemancer
contents.description: A quick procedural tile creator designed for pixel-art games.

contents.name: Timanthes
contents.description: A pixel art editor for the Commodore 64 computer running on Windows

contents.name: Charas
contents.description: Charas is a charset generator for RPG Maker.

contents.name: Spritemate
contents.description: Online Editor for Commodore 64 Sprites

contents.name: Squoosh
contents.description: Make images smaller using best-in-class codecs, right in the browser.

contents.name: SVGcode
contents.description: SVGcode is a Progressive Web App that lets you convert raster images like JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, AVIF, etc. to vector graphics in SVG format.

contents.name: SVG to PNG
contents.description: Batch convert unlimited SVGs to PNG rasters. Privacy-preserving, doesn't require uploading your assets.

contents.name: Vector Magic
contents.description: Free Raster to Vector Graphics Converter

contents.name: VTracer
contents.description: Raster to Vector Graphics Converter built on top of visioncortex
